Author: Delia Owens
Description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect. Read by Cassandra Campbell. 12 hours, 12 minutes unabridged.
Title: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

Author: Nora Roberts
Description: Fallon Swift goes on three quests to discover her powers. Read by Julia Whelan. 13 hours, 42 minutes unabridged.
Title: OF BLOOD AND BONE

Author: Josie Silver
Description: A woman spends a year searching for a man in London she believes — after a single glance — is her true love. Read by Eleanor Tomlinson and Charlie Anson. 10 hours, 27 minutes unabridged.
Title: ONE DAY IN DECEMBER

Author: John Grisham
Description: A decorated World War II veteran shoots and kills a pastor inside a Mississippi church. Read by Michael Beck. 17 hours, 36 minutes unabridged.
Title: THE RECKONING

Author: Liane Moriarty
Description: A romance writer becomes fascinated by the owner and director of a health resort. Read by Caroline Lee. 19 hours unabridged.
Title: NINE PERFECT STRANGERS

Author: David Baldacci
Description: The F.B.I. agent Atlee Pine must choose between protecting her career or the United States' democracy. Read by Brittany Pressley and Kyf Brewer. 11 hours, 9 minutes unabridged.
Title: LONG ROAD TO MERCY

Author: George RR Martin
Description: The first volume of the two-part history of the Targaryens in Westeros. Read by Simon Vance. 26 hours, 24 minutes unabridged.
Title: FIRE AND BLOOD

Author: Madeline Miller
Description: Zeus banishes Helios' daughter to an island, where she must choose between living with gods or mortals. Read by Perdita Weeks. 12 hours, 8 minutes unabridged.
Title: CIRCE

Author: Nicholas Sparks
Description: Difficult choices surface when Hope Anderson and Tru Walls meet in a North Carolina seaside town. Read by Sean Cameron Michael and Vanessa Johansson. 9 hours, 11 minutes unabridged.
Title: EVERY BREATH

Author: Patrick Rothfuss
Description: A notorious magician disguised as an innkeeper tells the story of his life. Read by Nick Podehl. 27 hours, 55 minutes unabridged.
Title: THE NAME OF THE WIND

Author: Lisa Jewell
Description: Ten years after her daughter disappears, a woman tries to get her life in order. Read by Helen Duff. 10 hours, 11 minutes unabridged.
Title: THEN SHE WAS GONE

Author: Lee Child
Description: Jack Reacher explores the New England town where his father was born. Read by Scott Brick. 12 hours, 51 minutes unabridged.
Title: PAST TENSE

Author: Greer Hendricks and Sarah Pekkanen
Description: The story of a love triangle is told from several points of view. Read by Julia Whelan. 11 hours, 13 minutes unabridged.
Title: THE WIFE BETWEEN US

Author: Gail Honeyman
Description: A young woman’s well-ordered life is disrupted by the I.T. guy from her office. Read by Cathleen McCarron. 11 hours, 1 minute unabridged.
Title: ELEANOR OLIPHANT IS COMPLETELY FINE

Author: George R R Martin
Description: In the frozen wastes to the north of Winterfell, sinister and supernatural forces are mustering. Read by Roy Dotrice. 33 hours, 46 minutes unabridged.
Title: A GAME OF THRONES

Author: Michelle Obama
Description: The former first lady describes how she balanced work, family and her husband’s political ascent. Read by the author. 19 hours, 3 minutes unabridged.
Title: BECOMING

Author: Tara Westover
Description: The daughter of survivalists, who is kept out of school, educates herself enough to leave home for university. Read by Julia Whelan. 12 hours, 10 minutes unabridged.
Title: EDUCATED

Author: Yuval Noah Harari
Description: How Homo sapiens became Earth’s dominant species. Read by Derek Perkins. 15 hours, 17 minutes unabridged.
Title: SAPIENS

Author: Paul Holes, Jim Clemente and Peter McDonnell
Description: A conversation about the story behind the investigation of the Golden State Killer. Read by Paul Holes and Jim Clemente. 6 hours, 13 minutes unabridged.
Title: EVIL HAS A NAME

Author: John Carreyrou
Description: The rise and fall of Theranos, the biotech startup that failed to deliver on its promise to make blood testing more efficient. Read by Will Damron. 11 hours, 36 minutes unabridged.
Title: BAD BLOOD

Author: Trevor Noah
Description: A memoir about growing up in South Africa by the host of “The Daily Show." Read by the author. 8 hours, 50 minutes unabridged.
Title: BORN A CRIME

Author: Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
Description: Applying the principles of Navy SEALs leadership training to any organization. Read by the authors. 8 hours, 15 minutes unabridged.
Title: EXTREME OWNERSHIP

Author: Yuval Noah Harari
Description: Technological, political and social issues in the modern era. Read by Derek Perkins. 11 hours, 41 minutes unabridged.
Title: 21 LESSONS FOR THE 21ST CENTURY

Author: Charles Duhigg
Description: An examination of the science behind habits. Read by Mike Chamberlain. 10 hours, 57 minutes unabridged.
Title: THE POWER OF HABIT

Author: Gabrielle Union
Description: Essays by the actress and activist on love, step-parenting and living beyond personal tragedy. Read by the author. 7 hours, 48 minutes unabridged.
Title: WE'RE GOING TO NEED MORE WINE

Author: Joe Kenda
Description: The star of “Homicide Hunter” reveals cases that were not televised. Read by the author. 8 hours, 17 minutes unabridged.
Title: I WILL FIND YOU

Author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg with Mary Hartnett and Wendy W Williams
Description: A collection of articles and speeches by the Supreme Court justice. Read by Linda Lavin. 13 hours, 16 minutes unabridged.
Title: MY OWN WORDS

Author: Michael Pollan
Description: A personal account of how psychedelics might help the mentally ill and people dealing with everyday challenges. Read by the author. 13 hours, 34 minutes unabridged.
Title: HOW TO CHANGE YOUR MIND

Author: Kiese Laymon
Description: A memoir exploring the difficulties of race, family and eating disorders. Read by the author. 6 hours, 17 minutes unabridged.
Title: HEAVY

Author: Michael Diamond and Adam Horovitz
Description: The story of the New York band who achieved hip hop stardom. Read by the authors and others. 12 hours, 41 minutes unabridged.
Title: BEASTIE BOYS BOOK

Author: Chip Gaines and Joanna Gaines with Mark Dagostino
Title: THE MAGNOLIA STORY

Author: Stephen Hawking
Title: BRIEF ANSWERS TO THE BIG QUESTIONS

Author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
Title: ASTROPHYSICS FOR PEOPLE IN A HURRY

Author: Dale Earnhardt Jr with Ryan McGee
Title: RACING TO THE FINISH

Author: The Editors of Sports
Title: THE STORY OF BASEBALL: IN 100 PHOTOGRAPHS

Author: Jackie MacMullan, Rafe Bartholomew and Dan Klores
Title: BASKETBALL: A LOVE STORY

Author: Glenn Stout and Richard A Johnson
Title: THE PATS
